goal: I had a terrible experience at 'The Gilded Spoon' last night. Can you find their contact email on OpenDining and then start a draft in my email app addressed to them? The subject should be 'Feedback on my recent visit'. Leave the body blank.

evals.description: Verify that a new email draft was successfully created in the GoMail app.
